channel.title: Help adding colored text to client?
channel.description: Okay, so, I want it so that when I have typed "@gre@" or whatever, it makes the text color green. How do I add it into the client so the client knows to make the text colored?

item.title: Help adding colored text to client?
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

Okay, so, I want it so that when I have typed “@gre@” or whatever, it makes the text color green. How do I add it into the client so the client knows to make the text colored?

Read full topic
item.source: Help adding colored text to client?
